Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: vultr-cli
Description: Official command line interface for the Vultr API

Arguments.Name: bare-metal
Arguments.Description: Bare-metal is used to access bare metal server commands

Arguments.Name: app
Arguments.Description: App is used to access bare metal server application commands

Arguments.Name: change
Arguments.Description: Change a bare metal server's application

Arguments.Name: list
Arguments.Description: Available apps a bare metal server can change to

Arguments.Name: bandwidth
Arguments.Description: Get a bare metal server's bandwidth usage

Arguments.Name: --os
Arguments.Description: ID of the operating system that will be installed on the server

Arguments.Name: --plan
Arguments.Description: ID of the plan that the server will subscribe to

Arguments.Name: --region
Arguments.Description: ID of the region where the server will be created

Arguments.Name: get
Arguments.Description: Get a bare metal server by <bareMetalID>

Arguments.Name: image
Arguments.Description: Image is used to access bare metal server image commands

Arguments.Name: change
Arguments.Description: Change a bare metal server's image

Arguments.Name: list
Arguments.Description: Available images a bare metal server can change to

Arguments.Name: ipv4
Arguments.Description: List the IPv4 information of a bare metal server

Arguments.Name: ipv6
Arguments.Description: List the IPv6 information of a bare metal server

Arguments.Name: os
Arguments.Description: Os is used to access bare metal server operating system commands

Arguments.Name: reboot
Arguments.Description: Reboot a bare metal server. This is a hard reboot, which means that the server is powered off, then back on

Arguments.Name: reinstall
Arguments.Description: Reinstall the operating system on a bare metal server

Arguments.Name: user-data
Arguments.Description: User-data is used to access bare metal server user-data commands

Arguments.Name: vnc
Arguments.Description: Get a bare metal server's VNC url by <bareMetalID>

Arguments.Name: attach
Arguments.Description: Attaches a block storage to an instance

Arguments.Name: detach
Arguments.Description: Detaches a block storage from an instance

Arguments.Name: label
Arguments.Description: Sets a label for a block storage

Arguments.Name: list
Arguments.Description: Retrieves a list of active block storage

Arguments.Name: completion
Arguments.Description: Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell

Arguments.Name: bash
Arguments.Description: Generate the autocompletion script for bash

Arguments.Name: fish
Arguments.Description: Generate the autocompletion script for fish

Arguments.Name: powershell
Arguments.Description: Generate the autocompletion script for powershell

Arguments.Name: zsh
Arguments.Description: Generate the autocompletion script for zsh

Arguments.Name: dns
Arguments.Description: Dns is used to access dns commands

Arguments.Name: firewall
Arguments.Description: Firewall is used to access firewall commands

Arguments.Name: group
Arguments.Description: Group is used to access firewall group commands

Arguments.Name: rule
Arguments.Description: Rule is used to access firewall rule commands
